ORGINC.title: ORGINC
ORGINC.description: How do you and your {response to spousepartfill} organize the income that one or both of you receive? Please choose the option that comes closest.
enumDescriptions: I manage all the money and give my {response to spousepartfill}
My {response to spousepartfill} manages all the money and gives me
We pool all the money and each take out what we need
We pool some of the money and keep the rest separate
We each keep our own money separate
